artifacts.name: Adventurer
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Opening chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

artifacts.name: Archaic Petra
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

artifacts.name: Berserker
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

artifacts.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

artifacts.name: Brave Heart
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP.

artifacts.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases two_Piece_Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

artifacts.name: Defender's Will
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party

artifacts.name: Gambler
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

artifacts.name: Gladiator's Finale
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

artifacts.name: Instructor
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

artifacts.name: Lavawalker
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%.

artifacts.name: Lucky Dog
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

artifacts.name: Maiden Beloved
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

artifacts.name: Martial Artist
artifacts.two_piece_bonus: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

artifacts.name: Noblesse Oblige
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst increase all party memebers' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

artifacts.name: Resolution of Sojourner
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

artifacts.name: Retracing Bolide
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

artifacts.name: Scholar
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occurs once every 3s.

artifacts.name: The Exile
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for other party members every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

artifacts.name: Thundering Fury
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

artifacts.name: Thundersoother
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%.

artifacts.name: Tiny Miracle
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

artifacts.name: Traveling Doctor
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

artifacts.name: Viridescent Venerer
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

artifacts.name: Wanderer's Troupe
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

artifacts.name: Blizzard Strayer
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: When a character attacks an enemy affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the enemy is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

artifacts.name: Heart of Depth
artifacts.four_piece_bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.
